ComicInfo.Summary:
A HIGH PRESSURE LOW
With another storm brewing and the city's deathtoll rising, Coast Guard veteran Virgil Lafleur is forced to adopt more gruesome methods in order to protect his fellow citizens from the horrors on the horizon...
From screenwriter Mark Landry and artist extraordinaire, Ashley Marie Witter (Squarriors, Interview with the Vampire), comes this visceral revenge thriller that merges the real-world hopes and horrors of a post-disaster community with an engaging thread of political corruption, class divide and blood-curdling terror!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Cover | Ashley Marie Witter | 1 | B | Subscription Cover | Mark Landry | 2 |

ComicInfo.Title: Blood Pressure
